amendment.description: An amendment to incorporate the provisions of H.R. 2 (the line-item veto), as passed by the House, into the bill.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Orton amendment (A017). Mr. Wolf stated that the provisions of the amendment would change existing law, constituting legislation on an appropriations bill and was, therefore, in violation of clause 2 of rule XXI. The Chair sustained the point of order.
